string.text:
The PX4 Storm is as tough and reliable as it is accurate, safe and easy to use. An advancement of the Beretta 8000 meant as a replacement of the 92FS for personal defense and law enforcement use, its rotating barrel allows for better recoil control, while the light frame helps reduce weight and increase ergonomics.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Italy
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Fabbrica d'Armi Pietro Beretta
Rechamber the weapon to use .45 ACP.
